name: Melffy Cathy
text: If your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step), or this card is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: You can return this card to the hand, then you can add 1 Beast monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Melffy Cathy". During your End Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Melffy Cathy" once per turn.
